hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Sa'eed Al_khudri that the Prophet said:"No sadaqah is due on less than five Awaq, no Sadaqah is due on less than five Dhawd, no Sadaqah is due on less than five Awsuq

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقَدْرِ الَّذِي تَجِبُ فِيهِ الصَّدَقَةُ
chapter.eng-name: The Amount On Which Zakah Is Due
